name: The Last Warrior: SPIRIT OF FIRE v1.0
name_original: The Last Warrior: SPIRIT OF FIRE v1.0
description:
Hello Player ! 
Informations About Game : 

- Name : The Last Warrior : Spirit Of Fire v1.0
- Genre : Adventure - action - rpg .
- Game Size : 504MB 
- Developing Time : 6 months 
- Game Engine : Unity 
Game Content : 
This Game is a 3D- Open World , its an amazing story . you are The Last Warrior and you will find the level items in order to reach to the final stage . you can explore, fight enemies , defeat bosses , in each level you will get a new ability . 


The Last Warrior is developed by RingoSoft team with an additional support like some friends and teams (6wrni team - fadrik alexander team) 
Ringo Soft Members : 

- Souhil Sid .

System Requirements : 

Minimum : 

  • CPU: INTEL CORE I3 - 5005U
  • CPU SPEED: Info.
  • RAM: 8 GB.
  • OS: Windows 7 or later.
  • VIDEO CARD: INTEL HD GRAPHICS 5500 or similar.
  • PIXEL SHADER: 5.0.
  • VERTEX SHADER: 5.0.
  • SOUND CARD: Yes.
